description: Most of the time, job applicants are nervous or even depressed. It's so refreshing to have someone cheerful in my office for a change. This guy was like that so we had a fun little chat about his career prospects. Eventually, I offered him a job as a promoter for an international corporation. It was a very nicely paid position. The boy accepted the job right away but couldn't afford our mediation fee. We had to figure something out. I was horny as hell so the solution was quite obvious. The boy agreed to undress and show me his boner. I just had to throw in a few 1 000s and he gobbled on my cock like crazy. He had a new girlfriend but she was at work all the time so, I guess, he was craving for physical contact. And I was definitely willing to give him a lot of it. Mainly to his tight virgin ass.
title: Dirty Scout 188
